detail_desc: Straight-cut shirt in airy, stretch viscose with a collar, darts at the back and a concealed button band at the front. Long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs and a decorative opening.
Two-strand anklet of thin metal chains, one with small pendants. Adjustable length 23–27 cm.
Bell-shaped skirts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Bustier in printed scuba jersey with a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Track jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Kangaroo pockets, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back, chest pocket and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey, one patterned.

Checked shirt in a soft viscose and cotton blend with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Knitted socks with a slightly higher shaft and soft pile lining.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, hole-patterned sections at the sides and reflective details.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short, round-necked dress in an airy cotton weave with contrasting colour details in broderie anglaise. Opening with crossover lacing at the back, short, scallop-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Unlined.

TOCA LIFE x H&M. Sports jacket in patterned fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch flexible denim with a high comfort factor. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft jersey.
Short coat in sturdy felted fabric with a zip down the front and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, flap welt front pockets, a welt chest pocket, and buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and straight legs with quilted sections at the knees.
Triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flare and double flounce at the cuffs. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Leather sandals with crossover straps at the front, padded leather insoles and rubber soles.
Small pouch bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 4x4x5.5 cm.
Lightweight slides with moulded insoles, an adjustable foot strap with a plastic buckle, and fluted soles.
Oval sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Playsuit in a patterned weave with a V-neck at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Long trumpet sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets and wide legs. Unlined.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Top in an airy, patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and a gathered seam at the top.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in waffled jersey with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs.
Short, A-line, jersey dress made from a modal and cotton blend.
Sleeveless top in pima cotton jersey.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
Sandals with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Halterneck body with a woven top, seam at the hips and jersey lower section. Press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit. Width 25 cm, circumference 55 cm.
Thong briefs in lace, mesh and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Cropped dungarees in soft, washed cotton denim with adjustable straps that cross at the back and fasten with a button at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, a zip and button at one side, large patch front pockets and straight, wide legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt. Partly lined.
Push-up bra in mesh-lined lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that join at the back and a metal fastener at the front.
Top in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in patterned jersey containing glittery threads with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Boots in imitation suede with a knee-high, lined shaft, adjustable tab with metal buckle and elastication at the top of the shaft, a zip below and fabric lining. Chunky sole. Heel 3 cm.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt, concealed zip in one side, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with embroidered text.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cropped top in patterned mesh with a round neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in recycled mesh, and chunky soles.

Calf-length dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Turtle neck that is twisted at the front, a V-shaped opening at top and an opening down the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Seam with decorative gathers under the bust and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Knee-length, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt front pockets. Unlined.
Top in an airy, crinkled weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave in a narrow, asymmetric cut at the top with a draped, wrapover front and concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, and a flared, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Beach towel in a soft cotton weave with fringes on the short sides. Supplied with a carry strap. Size 100x180 cm.
Dress with a slub cotton jersey bodice and woven skirt. Print motif at the top, short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam and bow at the waist and patch front pockets.

Ankle-length trousers in crisp cotton seersucker. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Velour-covered hair elastic.

Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-button jacket in a textured, stretch weave with peak lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger. Four with polished plastic stones.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft cotton with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.

Body in jersey with a mesh top. Deep V-neck and gathers down the front, back and sides to create a draped effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Cardigan in a soft, thin, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
